title: About me
text:
As a student of Digital Society, I am passionate towards creating digital solutions that have a positive impact on the society.I completed my Bachelor of Science degree in Information Technology from CHARUSAT University.
I am deeply interested in statistical analysis mainly in the fields of governance and urban mobility.

Welcome to my website!

title: Projects
text:
Code

Developed a web application to quickly summarize large blocks of text and videos/podcasts
It also allows the user to summarize the text from web links as well as from locally uploaded PDF files.
Used the Open AI API and Deepgram API for summarizing/transcribing the text and the Courier Email API to send emails
